name: The Origin (BlurredGames)
description:
THE ORIGIN is a short adventure game which talks about the human being creation myth from a different perspective. What would happen if we discovered our true origin?

This prototype has been created by one person in a few weeks for Icehouse Jam 2019,  so may you find bugs and problems while playing.

Due to the lack of time, this experience is only a small part of the complete prototype, although its development ends here, it will not continue.

CONTROLS:

Move: WASD

Mouse movement: Rotate camera / look around

Interact: Follow the screen messages

Zoom: Right mouse button

ESC: Pause Menu

Note
You can modify the mouse sensitivity and other parameters (like quality) in the "Options" menu.

CREDITS:

The music has been composed by Python Blue.

Voiceover by Klemens Koehring.

Special thanks to Roger Kilroy-Talbot for his invaluable help.

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

- Download the .zip file

- Extract the file (don't change the folder structure)

- Launch the "The Origin.exe" file

- Enjoy!
